solution_line_template: First find the total amount Jack earned from the bottles: ${bottle_deposit_per_bottle}/bottle * {num_bottles} bottles = $<<{bottle_deposit_per_bottle}*{num_bottles}={earnings_from_bottles}>>{earnings_from_bottles}

Then subtract that amount from his total earnings to find the amount he earned from cans: ${total_earnings} - ${earnings_from_bottles} = $<<{total_earnings}-{earnings_from_bottles}={earnings_from_cans}>>{earnings_from_cans}

Then divide his total earnings from cans by his earnings per can to find the number of cans he recycled: ${earnings_from_cans} / ${can_deposit_per_can}/can = <<{earnings_from_cans}/{can_deposit_per_can}={num_cans}>>{num_cans} cans
